attributes.action: Make wearing a blazer within school a optional part of uniform
attributes.additional_details: I want to do this because I belive students have the freedom of choice if they want to wear a nlazer or not without getting sanctioned
attributes.background: I want the government to publicly announce that school blazers are a optional part of school uniform

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban mandatory school uniforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591532
